**How to Use:**

1. Download the JSON files below
2. Navigate to your toolkit's database folder
3. 
4. 

**File Locations:**
```
database/
  ├── units.json (replace or merge)
  ├── weapons.json (replace or merge)
  ├── formations.json (replace or merge)
  └── nations.json (replace or merge)
```

**Important Notes:**
- [ ] Backup your existing data before importing
- [ ] This will overwrite existing data
- [ ] This will merge with existing data
